text: "Feel My Heart" is the debut single by the Japanese J-pop group Every Little Thing, released on August 7, 1996. The track was remixed by the Swiss trance producer, Moogwai, in 2002.Moogwai ==Track listing== # Feel My Heart -- 4:22 (Words & music - Mitsuru Igarashi) # Feel My Heart (Daverodgers Euro mix) -- 4:33 # Feel My Heart (Club mix) -- 6:24 # Feel My Heart (instrumental) -- 4:22 ==Chart positions== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (1996) !Peak position !Time in chart |- |Japan Oricon |align="center"|24 |14 weeks |} ==See also== *Avex Network *Oricon ==External links== * Avex Network * Oricon Style ==References== Category:1996 singles Category:Every Little Thing (band) songs Category:Songs written by Mitsuru Igarashi Category:1996 songs Category:Avex Trax singles
title: Feel My Heart
